emailservice.message: Selecteer de emaildienst die je wilt gebruiken
emailservice.description: The title of the block where the user can choose which email service (s)he uses

saved.description: Confirmation when someone changes an option

description.message: Open mailto: links met je favoriete online emaildienst
description.description: The description shown on chrome://extensions/ and in the webstore

restartBrowser.message: Herstart uw browser om deze instelling toe te passen.
restartBrowser.description: Safari users have to restart their browser in order to change settings

customURL.description: Clicking this label allows users to use a custom URL

customEmailService.description: Title of the block where users can enter custom URLs

customExplanation.message: Hier kun je de volledige URL opgeven naar de pagina waar je emails kunt opstellen. Klik hier voor uitleg
customExplanation.description: Explanation of the syntax for custom URLs. Do not edit these texts: and

multipleaccounts.description: Title of the block where users can check the option to always ask what client to use

alwaysask.message: Vraag me elke keer welke emaildienst ik wilt gebruiken
alwaysask.description: The option to always ask what client to use

maillinkofpage.description: Title of the block where users can check the option to mail the link of the current page

maillinkofthispage.message: Mail het adres van deze pagina
maillinkofthispage.description: Title of the context menu entry

maillinkofpagedesc.message: Voeg een item aan het rechtermuisknopmenu toe, waarmee je de link naar de huidige pagina kan verzenden
maillinkofpagedesc.description: Title of the block where users can check the option to mail the link of the current page

systemdefault.description: When you click this, it'll open the mailto link as if this extension wasn't installed

urlinput.message: Geef de URL op naar de pagina om emails op te stellen
urlinput.description: When you click this, it'll open the mailto link as if this extension wasn't installed

nameinput.description: When you click this, it'll open the mailto link as if this extension wasn't installed

contextmenuincompatible.message: De geselecteerde emaildienst is incompatibel met deze optie
contextmenuincompatible.description: Warning when the selected email service doesn't contain {subject} {url} or {body}
